tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE safety_records (
  incident_report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_type VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  reported_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE safety_inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100),
  inspection_result BOOLEAN,
  comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE training_certifications (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id UUID,
  certification_type VARCHAR,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE safety_inspections (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    result VARCHAR
);
